column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Although people may think that this place is over-rated
column2: I truly think it is a go-to staple.  With a large group of people
column3: or just a catch up with one or two friends
column4: this restaurant can be a great time.  I am a fan of their sangria and there are definitely some great tapas choices.  My recommendations are the shrimp with red pepper flakes
column6: the tenderloin with the blue cheese
column7: and the croquettes are always my favorites!
